GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api
serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article by its corresponding id

exampleResponse.title: Does Mitch predate civilisation?
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: Archaeologists have uncovered a gigantic statue from the dawn of humanity, and it has an uncanny resemblance to Mitch. Surely I am not the only person who can see this?!
